title: Classic New York cheesecake
ingredients: ['125g digestive biscuit crumbs', '4 tablespoons caster sugar', '75g butter, melted', '675g cream cheese, room temperature', '200g caster sugar', '4 eggs, room temperature', '1 tablespoon vanilla extract', '1 teaspoon cream of tartar', '475ml soured cream', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '100g caster sugar']
